task.title: Publishing the system model
task.shortdesc: When you create, delete, or modify a system model, the changes are saved locally and it is not visible to the other users of the Team Space. You must publish the system model changes to the Team Space repository to make your changes visible for all users of the Team Space.

info.p: The System Model page is displayed.

step.cmd: Perform any of the following actions:
Click the Publish icon Image of the publish icon. to update the changes made in the System Model page to the Team Space repository.

info.p: The Modified components and associations dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Select the components and associations that you want to commit.

info.note: If you want to remove any changes that you made, you can select the component and click Discard. The changes are then removed from the system model.

step.cmd: Enter a message in the Publish message field.

result.p: You have published the system model changes to the Team Space repository.
